QuestData.Title: Still Good!
QuestData.Description: The virmen to the south have been running off with all of our crops, but they're taking more than they can eat. They must be stockpiling them somewhere - the ones they like anyway.$B$BWill you go out and recover any of the uprooted crops you can find? I've got an island's worth of people to feed, and every single vegetable makes a difference.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 3 Uprooted Turnips, 3 Stolen Carrots, and 3 Pilfered Pumpkins.
